entry.title: First Post
entry.content: Even though no one is blogging anymore – I mean, some people do, and I really respect that – I am still creating this section becasue it could easily be transferred to a minimal tweeter machine, etc. Not that I really use twitter or any social media platform. I guess I should start writing something about myself so that I can remember everthing I want to.
entry.summary: Even though no one is blogging anymore – I mean, some people do, and I really respect that – I am still creating this section becasue it could easily be transferred to a minimal tweeter machine, etc. Not that I really use twitter or any social media platform. I guess I should start writing something about myself so that I can remember everthing I want to.

entry.title: Second, not the last, I hope

link.title: Second, not the last, I hope

entry.content:
I am watching How do you know, starring Reese Witherspooon and Paul Rudd. It’s kind of making me redefining how relationhsips should be. How life, decisions, self-consciousness, knowing-who-you-really-are-instead-of-being-told-who-you-should-be. I just love her character, Lisa.

Know yourself, Understand your own thoughts, seek for (and harder, identify)what you want. My lifelong subjects.
entry.summary: I am watching How do you know, starring Reese Witherspooon and Paul Rudd. It’s kind of making me redefining how relationhsips should be. How life, decisions, self-consciousness, knowing-who-you-really-are-instead-of-being-told-who-you-should-be. I just love her character, Lisa.
